p: In the current study, of all patients with AKI, 14.1% (10/71) required dialysis, which is higher than the proportion of patients with dengue-associated AKI requiring dialysis reported in two other studies as “only” 1.2% [ 9] and 7.1% [ 6]. However, many studies have reported no requirement of RRT in any patient with AKI [ 25, 33].
